answers.answer: Gatorade is good, but orange juice is better, and eating bananas.  But thirst is not the first symptom of dehydration, has your husband been checked for diabetes? I've had 5 members in my family have colectomies, and it takes a lot for one to get dehydrated, less than the normal person but still it shouldn't happen this easily.  I would have your husband checked for diabetes first.  Take care...

question: My husband had a Total Colectomy surgery five months ago due to colon cancer. The dehydration is a big issue for him. He was suggested to drink Gatorade and he is drinking that all the time. Anytime he is not drinking Gatorade he gets thirsty very quick. Is Gategorade the only thing he should drink? How about the water? What is the best way to rehydrate himself?
title: Total Colectomy and Dehydration
